subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Germany’s ice hockey team qualified for the Vancouver Olympics by edging Austria, 2-1, in Frankfurt. The victory guaranteed that Germany would top the four-team qualifying tournament in Hannover, where only the winner advances.
snippet: Germany’s ice hockey team qualified for the Vancouver Olympics by edging Austria, 2-1, in Frankfurt. The victory guaranteed that Germany would top the four-team qualifying tournament in Hannover, where only the winner advances.
